title: Tell Me
lyrics:
The way you're to go, my word is, you got it all wrong
The way you look bored, next time I'll give you this love
But tell me something, the feelings I don't wanna know
So tell me something, how could you just leave me alone

Just tell me you love me babe, tell me

'Cause I don't think I really see it

You tell me, you still there?

You tell me, tell me, you still there?

Tell me, tell me



Tell me, tell me

Tell me, tell me

Tell me, tell me

Tell me, tell me



So tell me something, I don't understand in the dark

Did you notice, notice I was falling apart?



I need a feeling, no I don't want you to know

So tell me something, say you understand or go



Just tell me you love me babe, tell me

'Cause I don't think I really see it

You tell me, you still there?

You tell me, tell me, you still there?

Tell me, tell me



Tell me, tell me

Tell me, tell me

Tell me, tell me

Tell me, tell-
